function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Low resilience to social threats such as pandemics leading to higher risk of developing psychiatric conditions.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low perception of social support leading to increased likelihood of developing psychological distress and psychiatric conditions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to inadequate supplies during quarantine period leading to anxiety and frustration","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to inadequate information from public health authorities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Symptoms related to quarantine reported in 28% of parents relative to 6% of those who were not quarantined.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"9% of hospital staff reported higher depressive symptoms 3 years after quarantine.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher depressive symptoms were reported in subjects with higher rates of quarantine.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Presence of alexithymic traits may reduce psychological resilience in some individuals.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative outcomes from the imposition of quarantine-related anger","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loneliness and boredom from social isolation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Psychological distress due to quarantine and isolation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Worry and fear related to physical symptoms potentially linked to infection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social isolation and uncertainty related to restrictions and lockdown measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Distress, frustration, and loneliness due to confinement and loss of social/physical contact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious spread of psychological effects such as depression, stress, anger, anxiety, and insomnia due to quarantine and covid-19 infection.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 epidemic on mental health","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological impact of quarantine related to covid-19 infection","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of direct strategy to manage psychosocial issues related to covid-19 crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 due to unrestricted social activities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological impact of covid-19 outbreak on mental health","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring environmental and climatic precursors of disease outbreaks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to strengthen public health preparedness, including surveillance and monitoring","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring environmental and socioeconomic drivers of disease","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dengue importation driven by international air traffic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in intercepting pathogen introduction through air traffic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Threat of vector-borne diseases to global public health","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Importation of dengue from dengue-affected areas through air travel","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relationship between air travel volume and imported dengue cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Seasonal variation in the rate of imported dengue cases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of aedes mosquitoes in europe","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"International travel and transmission of denv","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Historical local transmission events","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of environmental monitoring in public health surveillance systems","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High risk values for wnv infection in specific regions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dengue dispersal through air traffic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on external data sources for wnf case data and temperature anomalies may introduce inaccuracies and inconsistencies.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on temperature anomalies and environmental variables may overlook other important risk factors for wnv transmission.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of human and behavioral factors in wnv transmission risk assessment.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Elevated temperature accelerating viral replication and transmission of wnv","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Link between heat waves and wnf outbreaks in europe","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation between temperature deviations and wnf cases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Suitable environmental conditions for malaria transmission, including warmer temperatures, low elevation, and intensive agriculture","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Biological and environmental drivers of west nile virus wnv transmission, including bird and vector population densities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuing transmission of p. vivax by indigenous vectors in areas with permissive environmental and climatic conditions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of cases with travel history from the analysis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on geo-referenced environmental and climatic information for spatial modeling","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Importation of vector-borne diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Autochthonous transmission of malaria","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continued importation of malaria cases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of climatic, weather, environmental, and health data","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
